# Mill (Building)
## Overview
**Mill**

**Create** 17 Goods, 16 Labor (660 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Mill Room (Room)|Mill Room]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 2 [[Storage (Room)|Storages]]

A building used to cut lumber or grind grain.
